text: Old Khottabych () is a 1956 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Gennadi Kazansky.Кощей, рок и электрошок. Тайны фильма «Новогодние приключения Маши и Вити»Старик Хоттабыч It stars Nikolay Volkov, Alexey Litvinov, and Genya Khudyskov. ==Actors== * Nikolay Volkov as Hassan Abdurrahman ibn Khottab ("Old Khottabych") * Alexey Litvinov as Volka Kostylkov (Volka ibn Alyosha) * Genya Khudyskov as Zhenya - Volka's friend * Lyova Kovalychuk as Goga Pilyukin * Maya Blinova as Volka's Mother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Gennadi Kazansky
title: Old Khottabych
